item.title: TicTacToe
item.description: A Tic Tac Toe Game (if you get 3 in a row you win) TODO Fix the PVE Mode so that the score is incremented once when a player or entity wins, currently the score increments twice Credits Mitch Koko for his tutorial for Tic Tac Toe on his Youtube Channel Here Combined the fork from singhdhroov found Here so that there is a PVE game mode alongside PVP
